TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Cursors extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 物件的集合供 Windows Form 應用程式使用。

span.span: Provides a collection of objects for use by a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些此類別中的物件會採用不同的外觀，超過前文所述的。Some of the objects in this class can take on a different appearance than those described. 使用者可以調整其作業系統中的滑鼠指標設定，以變更游標外觀。The user can change the cursor appearance by adjusting the mouse pointer settings in their operating system. 平移和移動資料指標是靜態的而且無法變更作業系統。The panning and no move cursors are static and cannot be changed by the operating system. 平移和移動滑鼠滾輪作業期間使用資料指標。The panning and no move cursors are used during mouse wheel operations. 根據視窗可以捲動的方向，游標會變更至適當沒有移動游標在按下滑鼠滾輪時。Depending on the direction the window can be scrolled, the cursor changes to the appropriate no move cursor when the mouse wheel is clicked. 資料指標然後變更至適當的移動游標移動滑鼠時。The cursor then changes to the appropriate panning cursor as the mouse is moved. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何變更滑鼠資料指標使用屬性，類別，而類別。The following example demonstrates changing the mouse cursor using the property, the class, and the class. 此範例會建立包含表單的表單控制控制項，和控制項。The example creates a form that contains a control, a control, and a control. 包含所提供的所有資料指標類別。The contains all cursors provided by the class. 當使用者選取在滑鼠游標，則屬性設定為選取的資料指標，這會更新資料指標， 。When the user selects a mouse cursor in the , the property is set to the selected cursor, which updates the cursor for the . 會更新每次就會發生事件。The is updated every time the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/CPP/cursorexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/CS/cursorexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursors/VB/cursorexample.vb#1)] 下列範例會在其一般的大小和自動縮放模式，其大小的兩倍的表單上繪製指定的資料指標。The following example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此範例假設您擁有和物件傳入方法呼叫時。This example assumes that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

public: static property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ AppStarting { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得應用程式啟動時出現的游標。

span.span: Gets the cursor that appears when an application starts.

value.span: ，表示應用程式啟動時出現的游標。

span.span: The that represents the cursor that appears when an application starts.

value.span: ，表示箭號游標。

value.span: ，表示十字型游標。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範類別。The following example demonstrates the class. 若要執行此範例的地方在表單中貼上下列程式碼，並從表單的建構函式或 Load 方法呼叫 InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox; 方法。To run this example place paste the following code in a form and call the InitializeRadioButtonsAndGroupBox method from the form's constructor or Load method. 請確定所有的事件都已連接至其事件處理方法。Ensure all events are connected to their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRadioButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

value.span: ，表示預設游標。

public: static property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ Hand { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

value.span: ，表示手狀游標。

span.span: The that represents the hand cursor.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫衍生類別中的方法並使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class and using the property. 若要執行此範例，在新的表單中貼上下列程式碼並貼上形成格式之後的相同檔案中，這個類別。To run the example, paste the following code in a new form and paste this class, forming the same file, after the form. 將型別 FunButton 的按鈕加入至表單。Add a button of type FunButton to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlDefaultProperties/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WaitCursor As Cursor
public: static property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ WaitCursor { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得等待游標，其形狀通常為沙漏形狀。

span.span: Gets the wait cursor, typically an hourglass shape.

value.span: ，表示等待游標。

span.span: The that represents the wait cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要強制顯示等待游標移至指定的控制項，呼叫該控制項方法。To force display of the wait cursor over a given control, call that control's method. 若要讓顯示整個應用程式，不論控制項或表單已選取，將等待游標呼叫上類別。To make the wait cursor display for the entire application, regardless of the control or form selected, call on the class.
